Jx.Field.NumberSpinner

A Jx.Widget that provides a Text Field with two buttons that fires events and will spin numbers up and down

Example

new Jx.Field.NumberSpinner({
    label: 'Spin Field'
})

Extends

Jx.Field.Spinner

Author: Jonathan Bomgardner

A Jx.Widget that provides a Text Field with two buttons that fires events
